Package com.intellij.ui.content

Interface ContentManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentManagerImpl

    public interface ContentManager
extends Disposable
    Obtain via ContentFactory.createContentManager(ContentUI, boolean, com.intellij.openapi.project.Project).
    See Also:
    ContentsUtil

      • setSelectedContent

        ActionCallback setSelectedContent(Content content,
                                  boolean requestFocus,
                                  boolean forcedFocus,
                                  boolean implicit)
        Parameters:
        requestFocus - whether content will request focus after selection
        forcedFocus - unused
        implicit - if true and content cannot be focused (e.g. it's minimized at the moment) ActionCallback.REJECTED will be returned
        Returns:
        resulting ActionCallback for both selection and focus transfer (if needed)
